{"type":"Insert","index":0,"char":"f"}
----
text/plain
> source{char: "f", id: 0}
> next{left: 0, right: "end"}

{"type":"Insert","index":1,"char":"o"}
----
text/plain
> source{char: "o", id: 1}
> next{left: 0, right: 1}
> next{left: 1, right: "end"}

{"type":"Insert","index":1,"char":"o"}
----
text/plain
> source{char: "o", id: 2}
> next{left: 0, right: 2}
> next{left: 2, right: 1}
main{span: span{from: 0, to: "end"}}; {P1: 0, P2: 2, P3: 1, P4: "end"}.
